description: List tags associated with an existing data export.

parameters.name: ResourceArn
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the resource.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: The token to retrieve the next set of results.

nested_items.name: ResourceTags
nested_items.description: An optional list of tags to associate with the specified export. Each tag consists of a key and a value, and each key must be unique for the resource.

nested_items.name: Key
nested_items.description: The key that's associated with the tag.

nested_items.name: Value
nested_items.description: The value that's associated with the tag.
